subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Bucks overcame 17 fourth-quarter points from Jamal Crawford to hold off the Knicks on Sunday. Eddy Curry shot 6 for 9 and had 15 points in his return from a strained left calf muscle.
snippet: The Bucks overcame 17 fourth-quarter points from Jamal Crawford to hold off the Knicks on Sunday. Eddy Curry shot 6 for 9 and had 15 points in his return from a strained left calf muscle.
